titleStmt.title: A second address directed to his Excellency the Lord Generall Cromwell, and the Right Honourable the Councell of State sitting at White-Hall being the humble petition of Lieutenant Colonell John Lilburne.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb dwelling in Thamestreet over against Baynards Castle,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: From Mr Sheriff Underwoods house in Bucklers-Bury in London, June 16. 1653.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
